CustomField.description: If a date field in another record should be set when this letter is sent or received, then enter that record's object name here (for example, Proposal__c or Payment_Method__c).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If a date field in another record should be set when this letter is sent or received, then enter that record's object name here (for example, Proposal__c or Payment_Method__c).
CustomField.label: Date sent/recd object name
